titles.title: O For A Faith That Will Not Shrink

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O For A Faith That Will Not Shrink, Though Pressed By Many A Foe, That Will Not Tremble On The Brink Of Any Earthly Woe!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: That Will Not Murmur Nor Complain Beneath The Chastening Rod, But In The Hour Of Grief Or Pain Will Lean Upon Its God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: A Faith That Shines More Bright And Clear When Tempests Rage Without, That, When In Danger, Knows No Fear, In Darkness Feels No Doubt;

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: That Bears Unmoved The World’s Dread Frown, Nor Heeds Its Scornful Smile, That Seas Of Trouble Cannot Drown, Nor Satan’s Arts Beguile;

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Lord, Give Us Such A Faith As This, And Then, Whatever May Come, We’ll Taste Even Here The Hallowed Bliss Of An Eternal Home.
